{{Description|The storm clouds gathering over [[Liyue]] have finally parted, and the schemes that once gripped this land have been shattered by the combined efforts of the [[Qixing]], the adepti, and yourself.<br>Still, the memories of your duel with [[Childe]] of the [[Fatui]] in the depths of the [[Golden House]] remain fresh in your mind.<br>Relive this duel, and you may yet learn something new...|Memories: The Golden Shadow}}
'''Enter the Golden House''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked after completing {{Quest|A New Star Approaches}}. Players can relive the battle they had with Fatui Harbinger [[Childe]] and receive rewards.
